name: Very Irrelevant Stuff Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: On a pack of cigarettes in the Canada, the Surgeon General's warning warns that smoking may cause cancer?
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Canadian law states that a warning must be affiched to each and every box.

questions.text: Who made an Edge soda between 1999 and 2002?
questions.explanation:
RC.

	RC Edge was RC's attempt at a high energy drink, but only lasted for a few years. In 2004 Pepsi introduced a 'mid-carb' drink called Pepsi Edge for consumers wanting an alternative to diet sodas.

questions.text: The "Coats and Clark" company makes sewing floss?
In which state is "Mary Kay Cosmetics Inc."?
With which record label was Lenny Kravitz signed in the early 1990s?
questions.explanation:
Virgin.

	Lenny Kravitz released many hits with this label.

questions.text: Is the card game "Rook" distributed by "Parker Brothers"?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Another game by "Parker Brothers" is "Monopoly".

questions.text: Which is the correct spelling for this brand of cigarettes?
What was the world's largest circulation magazine on the turn of the millenia - 2000?
According to its bottle, is "Liquid Paper" flammable?
Steve Irwin, the man who has the show "The Croc Hunter" (on Animal Planet), has a son named Bindi?
